mapper.select: select b.bState as payState, b.bQuantity as payCount, u.mname as userName, u.Maddr as payAddr, u.mtel as payTel, b.bQuantity*p.pprice as payTotal, p.pimg1 as payImg, s.sname as payStoreName, b.bTitle||b.bOption as payContent, b.bTitle as payTitle, b.bPrice as payPrice from buy b inner join product p on b.pid = p.pid inner join store s on s.sid = p.sid inner join users u on b.username = u.username where b.bid= #{list}
